Class DBPortPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.util.SimplePool<DBPort>
      • com.mongodb.DBPortPool
  • Deprecated. 
    This class is NOT a part of public API and will be dropped in 3.x versions.

    @Deprecated
public class DBPortPool
extends SimplePool<DBPort>
    This class is NOT part of the public API. Be prepared for non-binary compatible changes in minor releases.
